subdisciplines.name: Galactic Archaeology
subdisciplines.description: A subfield of Galactic Astronomy that uses stellar populations to reconstruct the evolutionary history of the Milky Way Galaxy.

subdisciplines.name: Galactic Dynamics
subdisciplines.description: A subfield of Galactic Astronomy that studies the gravitational interaction of stars and other objects in the Milky Way Galaxy.

subdisciplines.name: Interstellar Medium
subdisciplines.description: A subfield of Galactic Astronomy that studies the matter, such as gas and dust, that exists between stars in the Milky Way Galaxy.

subdisciplines.name: Stellar Populations
subdisciplines.description: A subfield of Galactic Astronomy that studies the distribution and properties of different types of stars in the Milky Way Galaxy.
